text.text: Linux was originally developed for personal computers based on the Intel x86 architecture, but has since been ported to more platforms than any other operating system. Due to the dominance of Linux-based Android on smartphones, Linux, including Android, has the largest installed base of any general-purpose operating system, as of May 2022.
